Name: Slime
Script: Before Combat: /*if(target.getskillcard().name == ~Robot Calculate~){ giveequipment(~Slimy Payload~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Slimy Payload~[;] true[;] false); self.equipment.remove(~Slime Ball~); self.equipment.remove(~Slime Ball~); }*/
Last Words 1: Slup slup SLORP slurp!||SLORP slurp! SLUP!

Name: Mimic
Script: Before Start Turn: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } removeequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x); var mimicequipment = loadtext(~diceydungeons/mysterybox~); giveequipment(rand(mimicequipment) + x[;] true[;] false);
Script: End Turn: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } removeequipment(ALL); giveequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x[;] true[;] false);
Last Words 1: Hey[;] I've got some super-comfy cushions|here if you want to crawl in for a nap...
Last Words 2: Oh well done! But that fight must have taken it out of you.||Why not climb into this entirely non-suspicious|chest-shaped resting space and take a nap?

Name: Stereohead
Script: Before Combat: if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Sonic Wave~); self.equipment.remove(~Sonic Wave~); giveequipment(~Accordion~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Accordion~[;] true[;] false); }
Last Words 1: Hey[;] rad fight!||I don't suppose you've got any cassettes with you|from literally any year after 1986?
Last Words 2: Ah what a downer! Where's that mixtape I made to|play when everything goes wrong?||I hope I haven't lost it - that would make me|need it even more...

Name: Pirate
Script: Before Combat: if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ self.firstwords = ~Yarrr[;] matey! Ye be-[newline]What the fuck.~; self.alwaysspeakfirstwords = true; self.canspeakfirstwords = true; }
Last Words 1: Aye I'm far from the sea but a fella like me?||Though the ocean's apart I'm a pirate at heart!
Last Words 2: A pirate cares nothing for 'win' or for 'lose'.|A pirate cares only for fighting and booze!
Last Words 3: See my beard! Ye admire it?|It's 'cos I'm a pirate!
Last Words Endgame: Arrrr[;] good to see ye back! Ye'll not find it easier just because|ye beat Lady Luck once[;] yer know...

Name: Sorceress
Script: Before Combat: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } var list = [FIRE[;] ICE[;] SHOCK[;] WEAKEN]; if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ list.remove(WEAKEN); } var sorceresstype = rand(list); if (sorceresstype == FIRE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x[;] ~Burning Light~  + x[;] ~Burning Light~ + x[;] ~Infliction~ + x][;] false[;] false); }else if (sorceresstype == ICE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x[;]  ~Ice Shard~  + x[;] ~Ice Shard~ + x[;] ~Infliction~ + x][;] false[;] false); }else if (sorceresstype == SHOCK){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x[;]  ~Electric Shock~ + x[;] ~Electric Shock~ + x[;] ~Infliction~ + x][;] false[;] false); }else if (sorceresstype == WEAKEN){ giveequipment([~Cauldron~ + x[;]  ~Sonic Wave~ + x[;] ~Sonic Wave~ + x[;] ~Infliction~ + x][;] false[;] false); }
Last Words 1: okay cool[;] thanks for the fight or whatever|sideeye.gif||ugh[;] this place is the worst

Name: Copycat
Script: Before Combat: /*if(target.getskillcard().name != ~Robot Calculate~){ runscript(~diceydungeons/copycat~[;][self[;]target[;]Rules.upgradeenemyequipment[;]false]); } if(target.getskillcard().name == ~Robot Calculate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); self.innate = []; self.equipment[1].fulldescription = ~This will turn into your 2nd[newline]jackpot skill at the start of[newline]Copycat's turn~; self.equipment[2].fulldescription = ~This will turn into your 3rd[newline]jackpot skill at the start of[newline]Copycat's turn~; }*/ runscript(~diceydungeons/copycat~[;][self[;]target[;]Rules.upgradeenemyequipment[;]false]);
Script: Before Start Turn: /*for(i in 0...3){ var PickedSkill = new elements.Skill(target.getvar(~currentjackpotskills~)[i]); var BackCastList = [~PC Fans~[;] ~Basil's Protection~[;] ~Cthulhu's Shield~[;] ~Ctrl + C~[;] ~Dead Ringer~[;] ~Double Roll~[;] ~Dragon's Roll~[;] ~Duplicate~[;] ~Fifths Roll~[;] ~Final Countdown~[;] ~Firey Roll~[;] ~Guarded Fling~[;] ~Icy Roll~[;] ~Jimbo's Trick~[;] ~Ka... Ching!~[;] ~Lifeblood~[;] ~Limit Break~[;] ~Lucky Roll~[;] ~Midnight Snake~[;] ~Nanomachines~[;] ~Perfect Spanner~[;] ~Persona~[;] ~Prickly Pear~[;] ~Reshuffle~[;] ~Ripper Mode~[;] ~Run It Back~[;] ~Salvaging~[;] ~Sandvich~[;] ~Slippery Shoes~[;] ~Stars And Time~[;] ~Stored Prize~[;] ~Suit Up~[;] ~The 50/50~[;] ~The 75/25~[;] ~Timebomb~]; var eq = self.equipment[i]; eq.displayname = PickedSkill.name; eq.fulldescription = PickedSkill.description; eq.script = PickedSkill.script; eq.changecolour(~YELLOW~); eq.temporary_thisturnonly = false; eq.namemodifier = ~~; var skillName = PickedSkill.name; if(skillName[skillName.length - 1] == ~+~){ skillName = skillName.substr(0[;] ChosenJackpotSkills[i].length - 1); } eq.castdirection = -1; if(BackCastList.indexOf(skillName) > -1){ eq.castdirection = 1; } }*/
Script: End Turn: /*if(target.getskillcard().name != ~Robot Calculate~){ runscript(~diceydungeons/copycat~[;][self[;]target[;]Rules.upgradeenemyequipment[;]true]); } if(target.getskillcard().name == ~Robot Calculate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); self.equipment.remove(~Copied Skill~); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Copied Skill~[;] true[;] false); self.innate = []; self.equipment[1].fulldescription = ~This will turn into your 2nd[newline]jackpot skill at the start of[newline]Copycat's turn~; self.equipment[2].fulldescription = ~This will turn into your 3rd[newline]jackpot skill at the start of[newline]Copycat's turn~; }*/ runscript(~diceydungeons/copycat~[;][self[;]target[;]Rules.upgradeenemyequipment[;]true]);
Last Words 1: I know you are[;] but what am I?[]
Last Words 2: I'm rubber[;] you're glue. Bounces off|me and sticks to you!

Name: Wisp
Script: Before Combat: /*if(target.getskillcard().name == ~Robot Calculate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Fool's Fire~); self.equipment.remove(~Burning Light~); self.equipment.remove(~Burning Light~); giveequipment(~Capitalize~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Exploit~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Market Gap~[;] true[;] false); }*/
Last Words 1: Daaaa! Daaa! Da-doo! Bounce bounce!||I love it when you contestants win[;]|your victory song is so much fun!
Last Words Endgame: BOUNCE BOUNCE BOUNCE!||Yippeeee! You can do it!

Name: Singer
Script: Before Combat: if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Sad Verse~); self.equipment.remove(~Sad Verse~); self.equipment.remove(~High Note~); giveequipment(~Sea Shanty~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~Sea Shanty~[;] true[;] false); giveequipment(~High Note~[;] true[;] false); }
Last Words 1: Ugh[;] that sucks.||Well[;] adversity fuels art. I'll turn this into a song!
Last Words 2: Ugh[;] I'll have to add this as an extra verse to the|song I wrote last time.
Last Words Endgame: Hey[;] don't run off[;] take a flyer for my show[;] I'm|playing an open mic night next Tuesday...

Name: Audrey
Script: Before Combat: if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ self.equipment.remove(~Earthquake~); giveequipment(~Burst The Hull~[;] true[;] false); }
Last Words 2: Ugh! Well[;] thanks for inspiring me to work harder.||I'll get you next time!
Last Words (if they win): Bad luck there! Keep working hard! You'll make it one day!
